Author: p2pglobalnetwork
Title: [ANN] [ICD] P2P Global Network -A Network with a Cycle of Mutual Financial Gain
Body: “We’re here when you need us most!”   Distribute and Receive Assets With The Peer 2 Peer Global Network, A Network with a Cycle of Mutual Financial Gain  WEBSITE / WHITE PAPER/  TELEGRAM/ TWITTER / FACEBOOK / LINKEDIN/ YOUTUBE / MEDIUM / REDDIT   _______________________________________________________________________________   --------Pre-ICD dates: December 1: 12/01/2018 12:00 (AM) - December 15: 12/15/2018 12:00 (AM) 40% Bonus --------  ----------ICD dates: December 16: 12/16/2018 12:00 (AM) - January 29: 01/29/2019 12:00 (AM) (0-30% Bonus) ----------  _____________________________________________________    INTRODUCTION -----------------------------------  We are a decentralized peer to peer network application with the potential to financially benefit members when they become unemployed. Acceptance into the program will be determined via crowdsourcing Distributed Consensus among peers of the network.  Our moto is: "We’re here when you need us most!" This is because we hold no central decision process affecting the outcome. No One Is Denied Benefits  Peer 2 Peer Global Network is birthed with the aim to solve the burning financial problem that unemployment causes with these unavoidable and unfortunate life incidents. We realize that unavoidable circumstances can lead to unfortunate circumstances and problems. Peer 2 Peer Global Network specializes in solving those problems. We do just that with a network that utilizes trigger-executed smart contracts to assure delivery of payment in a decentralized blockchain environment when validated! We do this because we are dynamic team who places a high value on problem solving.  OTHER DOCUMENTS -----------------------------------------           P2P Global Commitment ----------------------------------------------------  P2P remains committed to its core value to offer a service that change lives! P2P Use a transparency, and a decentralized system. Peer 2 Peer Global Network is dedicated to deliver the highest level of services to help our members achieve basic amenities in distress situation of life. With P2P you will always receive the support you need simultaneously through the P2P network with a Cycle of assistance for betterhood!  We’re Here When You Need Us Most!  We will continue to provide the best privacy policies available around the globe, while eliminating the common failure found in a single point of authority.        Core Objectives: -----------------------------------  To build the world's most prominent economy to serve the needy:  •  The economy as a whole will be able to compensate those in need with predetermined wages set by the predefined complex smart contract which will help the unemployed     users. •  Prioritize  the need of the users to build a sophisticated reputaion system. •  Create a decentralized economy  which will support the users based upon their need and their input through the smart contract. •  Create a disaster relief whereas those in disaster areas can receive  help with lodging,  food etc...  to help them get back on track. •  Create a job marketplace for our members  where P2P Tokens will be used to compensate workers for work performed   Solution Insight -----------------------------------      Road Map ----------------------     Blockchain Database ----------------------------------------------      Team ------------      Advisors -------------------     WEBSITE / WHITE PAPER/  TELEGRAM/ TWITTER / FACEBOOK / LINKEDIN/ YOUTUBE / MEDIUM / REDDIT

Author: p2pglobalnetwork
Title: [ANN] [ICD] P2P Global Network -A Network with a Cycle of Mutual Financial Gain
Body: _______________________________________________________________________________  -------- HOLIDAY SPECIAL REWARD!--------  --------TELL US YOUR STORY AND WIN #p2p--------  Win our Founder's tokens - up to 75% of 50K p2p   _____________________________________________________  Rewards: ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ • Win our Founder's tokens - up to 75% of 50K p2p   To participate: ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ 1. Join Crypto Wine Exchange Telegram chat: https://t.me/joinp2p 3. Fill in that form: Here 4. Check this spreadsheet for additional information as spots fill up: Spreadsheet Feel free to ask any questions in Crypto Wine Exchange telegram chat. • After the fulfilment you must write a message on the forum with links to your posts • Report should be send to ani.cmo@p2pglobal.io email no later than 8th January • Report should include link to the post and screenshot of the number of likes/shares  on the 10th January at 00:00 CST  Rules and Terms: ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ • Article should be at least 600 words long • Good English - Grammarly tool score above 90% (https://www.grammarly.com/) • Your text must be original. We do not accept copy-pasted content. (Originality upper than 85% by Plagscan https://www.plagscan.com/plagiarism-check/) • All publications must be published publicly. Private articles will not be accepted; • Writers should familiarize themselves with the official white papers onhttps://www.p2pglobal.io/ to ensure accurate depiction of P2P Global Network Platform uses. • In Article you must mention our name, website link or social media links. Also, the positive approach to our solution should be the main information beside your story. • Article must consist #p2pglobalnetwork #MarryP2PChristmas and #p2p • Please, do not mention real names of the bosses, managers or company name • If you want to check the article before you publish it - please contact ani.cmo@p2pglobal.io • Article must be published on your personal social media channel (FB story, Linkedin Article) or Personal Medium, or your own Blog • Article should be shared on your social media with mention of our page. • After the fulfillment you must write a message on the forum with links to your posts • Report should be send to ani.cmo@p2pglobal.io email no later than 8th January • Report should include link to the post and screenshot of the number of likes/shares  on the 10th January at 00:00 CST  Some ideas for the posts: ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ • ARTICLE • Article topic is your personal story about distress situation. • Distress situation can be an unemployment situation when you could't find new job for a while so you get frustrated and antisocial • All distress situation you can mention are availabe in our Whitepaper: https://www.p2pglobal.io/public/uploads/2018/11/p2pglobal-whitepaper.pdf (First 20 pages) • Read carefully whats the aim of our Platform because your article need to be based that our solution - is the best solution for distress situations  VOTING RULES: ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ • You have 10 days from the day story is published to collect votes • Top 5 stories with maximum votes will be rewarded. • 1 like is one vote, 1 share is one vote. Number of shares and likes will decide are you on top 5 • You are allowed to publish story on FB Story, Linkedin Article, Medium and your Blog - choose one or all channel.  All likes and shares will be calculated  REPORTING: ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ • After the fulfillment you must write a message on the forum with links to your posts • Report should be send to ani.cmo@p2pglobal.io email no later than 8th January • Report should include link to the post and screenshot of the number of likes/shares  on the 10th January at 00:00 CST

Author: RedenBlack13
Title: [ANN] [ICD] P2P Global Network -A Network with a Cycle of Mutual Financial Gain
Body: Although I really like the intent of this project, I honestly don't see a real solution to the problems they aim to solve.  In my personal opinion, this project should be presented as a service for the public administration or for private non-profit organisations, and perhaps it could also have a good outcome.

Author: rheyank
Title: [ANN] [ICD] P2P Global Network -A Network with a Cycle of Mutual Financial Gain
Body: Will your team be conducting any online events, such as webinars, Q&As, or AMA on Reddit?  Plenty of ICOs have fallen prey to scammers who copy and slightly alter an ICO’s original website, Facebook, Twitter, etc. By doing this they can trick investors into sending funds to the wrong address. Taking the precautionary measures to ensure investors are directed toward the right address can save headaches and fiat for the investors and the project. Hopefully the team does so… Great work!

Author: Twinkledoe
Title: [ANN] [ICD] P2P Global Network -A Network with a Cycle of Mutual Financial Gain
Body: Do you have enough users of your platform to survive in this market? Your thread is not having a lot of audience from the community here but maybe you have more users outside this forum. Because the platform can sustain its presence in the market if there are sufficient users of their platform. Otherwise, the project is doomed to failure.
